General architecture and design of the system.

= AppMain and AppData =

AppData is the Vaadin Session.

= Navigation =

Navigation from page to page is performed by calling AppData.getApplication().showXYZView(), which in turn, replaces the "Window".

= Persistence =

In order to have entity relationships with JDO, entity keys must be defined ([https://developers.google.com/appengine/docs/java/datastore/jdo/creatinggettinganddeletingdata#Keys more]).
